name: Blackbird - Crow - Gran Toro
additionalNotes: Created by master blender Jonas Santana, the Blackbird Crow is a medium-strength cigar this expertly hand rolled in the Dominican Republic. The Crow’s dark, sweet Mexican San Andres maduro wrapper cloaks a Dominican binder, which houses premium Nicaraguan and USA Pennsylvania fillers. The Blackbird’s solid construction creates a smooth draw that allows its complex flavors of spice, chocolate, and tobacco to come through.
